about_the_game:
🥒 COLLECT YOUR COLLECTION OF KUKUMBERS! 🌛

Dive into a world of limited edition kukumber designs that will disappear forever!
Every month, a new collection is released, and once it's gone, it becomes a special treasure!

🍀 Some kukumbers are extremely rare, with only a few available. Will you be lucky enough to grab one?*

🎄 SEASON 1: WINTER HARVEST

🗓️ Available from December 1, 2024 – February 28, 2025

✨ Embark on your journey with our kukumbers. Take your first kukumbers which become rarest!

🌟 DON’T MISS OUT! :star2:

💾 Add to your wishlist and secure your chance to own these exclusive kukumbers.

🎮 New designs every season. Rare forever. Start your collection today.

name: KUKUMBER

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 / 8 / 10 / 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-2100 or AMD FX-6300
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Any
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Not required
  • VR Support: Not required
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7 / 8 / 10 / 11
  • Processor: Intel i5 5500 / AMD Ryzen 5 5600X
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Any
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Not required
  • VR Support: Not required
